1.Title: SPOCRA Creation Committee Candidate Election
1.Question: Choose 3 candidates for election to the initial SPOCRA Creation Committee
1.Description: Each SPO shall select three (3) candidates of their choice to be elected to the SPOCRA Creation Committee. You may only vote for a candidate once.

VoteOptions.Name: John Q. Public
VoteOptions.Description: Vote for John Q. Public because he's the right person for the job!

VoteOptions.Name: Jane Doe
VoteOptions.Description: Vote for Jane Doe to serve on the Creation Committee because I've got the passion, experience, and gumption to get things done!

VoteOptions.Name: John Smith
VoteOptions.Description: Vote for John Smith because reasons!
